original_title: Mary Chapin Carpenter: One Night Lonely
overview: A rare solo performance by Mary Chapin Carpenter, filmed in November 2020, at Carpenter’s favorite venue, Virginia’s legendary Wolf Trap. Taped during the pandemic in front of an empty house, the concert features selections from her most recent album, The Dirt and The Stars, and songs from throughout her career.
title: Mary Chapin Carpenter: One Night Lonely
